com.ibm.is.cc.javastage.api

Interface Link

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    InputLink, OutputLink

    public interface Link
    Interface for manipulating incoming or outgoing Record objects.
    Version:
    1.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Link.LinkType
      An enumeration type represents Link type

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ColumnMetadata getColumn(int columnIndex)
      Retrieves a column metadata corresponding to a given position of the column.
      ColumnMetadata getColumn(String columnName)
      Retrieves a column metadata corresponding to a given name of the column.
      int getColumnCount()
      Retrieves the number of columns in this link.
      List<ColumnMetadata> getColumnMetadata()
      Retrieves an ordered list of column metadata
      int getLinkIndex()
      Retrieves the position of this link in its stage.
      Link.LinkType getLinkType()
      Retrieves the Link type.
      Properties getUserProperties()
      Retrieves a set of user properties for this link.
      List<ColumnMetadata> subtractColumnList(Link link)
      Retrieves a list of column metadata that are in this link but not in the specified link.

    • Method Detail

      • getLinkType

        Link.LinkType getLinkType()
        Retrieves the Link type.
        • Link.LinkType.INPUT
        • Link.LinkType.OUTPUT
        • Link.LinkType.REJECT
        Returns:
        The type of this link.

      • getLinkIndex

        int getLinkIndex()
        Retrieves the position of this link in its stage. This index is corresponding to "Link label" value specified in "Link Ordering" tab on Designer.
        Returns:
        The position of this link, in the range 0...getColumnMetadata().size()-1.

      • getColumnCount

        int getColumnCount()
        Retrieves the number of columns in this link. This number is same as the size of an order list can be retrieved by getColumnMetadata().
        Returns:
        The column count.

      • getColumnMetadata

        List<ColumnMetadata> getColumnMetadata()
        Retrieves an ordered list of column metadata
        Returns:
        An ordered list of ColumnMetadata objects in this link. Returns an empty list if no columns are available.

      • getColumn

        ColumnMetadata getColumn(int columnIndex)
        Retrieves a column metadata corresponding to a given position of the column.
        Parameters:
        columnIndex - The position of the column in job design.
        Returns:
        A ColumnMetadata object.
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - If the columnIndex is invalid.

      • getColumn

        ColumnMetadata getColumn(String columnName)
        Retrieves a column metadata corresponding to a given name of the column.
        Parameters:
        columnName - column name (case insensitive)
        Returns:
        A ColumnMetadata object. null if a given name is not found on this link.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if columnName is null.

      • getUserProperties

        Properties getUserProperties()
        Retrieves a set of user properties for this link.
        Returns:
        A Properties object that presents a set of user properties. Returns null if no user properties are available for this link.

      • subtractColumnList

        List<ColumnMetadata> subtractColumnList(Link link)
        Retrieves a list of column metadata that are in this link but not in the specified link.
        Parameters:
        link - Link to compare
        Returns:
        A list of ColumnMetadata objects that are in this link but not in the specified link. Returns an empty list if no such columns.
